column4: Heh. funny bug report on brassero  - 'fixed my problem by using DeVeDe' :) thats more of a 'work around' :)
I dident even know Brasero could convert video to dvd format.
it would be easier yes, but I am a stubborn person when it comes to this kind of thing... would like to have a go at fixing it first :/
yea. :) i just found it amuseing the bug reporter said he fixed it by using another app. ;)
Oh, I must have missed that one :)
im seeing the same message here. but i dont even have a blank disk in the drive. :) i just want to make an .iso
BobJonkman There is no error coming from brasero, the thing just won't burn anything
at the top of the brassero window theres a message box built in. thats where i see the message
i got issues  on my LiteOn DVD burner also.
are you also using 2.28.2-0ubuntu1?
are you also using brasero-2.28.2-0ubuntu1?
what are your errors?
it wont ungrey the burn button and has a message at the top about wrong disktype or somthing. I saw a similer bug report on it earlier.
Thanks, shall delve in deeper, might come back to you for more info later...
can you insert a blank cdrom and then paste the dmesg output please?
ok. lets see
http://paste.ubuntu.com/325300/
your burner is a usb one?
that looks about like the same sort of info.messages i always see when i put in a blank disk. :) not sure how its showing any problems
Ok give me a sec to try it out
something odd here... I shall keep digging I think
